alert.note: Alert for Sheep Range; Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 07 at 12:38PM PST until November 09 at 4:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TUESDAY TO 4 PM PST WEDNESDAY ABOVE 7000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected above 7000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 20 inches, with over 2 feet of accumulating snow possible at the mountain peaks above 9500 feet. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Sheep Range and Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon. * WHEN...From 6 AM Tuesday to 4 PM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult at times on upper sections of Lee Canyon and Kyle Canyon roads. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions will make travel very hazardous or impossible. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Sheep Range; Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon
